'''Replicator Keystone''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

After carrying a [[Forged Primal Light]] to the Replicator Keystone, an [[Everlight Cell]], [[Neverlight Cell]], [[Obscuring Cell]], [[Verity Cell]], [[Primal Sconce]], or [[Primal Sandglass]] will be created. These devices can be used to explore deeper into the ruins.
